strings.trackOne: Rastear o Token Controlado atualmente ativo
strings.cloneTurnPlayer: Clonar Janela de Visualização do Jogador do Turno
strings.missingTypeNotice: Tipo Legado/Ausente. Selecione um novo tipo no menu suspenso para editar.
strings.trackManual: Rastrear uma Lista manual de Tokens
strings.limitCanvas: Limitar Ecrã às Bordas do Ecrã
strings.manualOBSWarning: You are running in OBS Mode. If you want to return to normal, press SHIFT + ALT + CONTROL + O (Default) or your custom keybind. Then reload the page.
strings.disableOBSModeHint: Turns off the manual OBS Mode setting if you are stuck in it.

popupCloseDelay.Name: Atraso Fechamento de Pop-Up
popupCloseDelay.Hint: Seconds until pop-ups are automatically closed. 0 to disable

enableOBSWebsocket.Hint: If checked, OBS Websocket will be used for Remoting
enableOBSWebsocket.Name: Ativar OBS Websocket?

diceSoNiceOverlayWidth.Hint: Width of the element in pixels
diceSoNiceOverlayWidth.Name: Largura Sobreposição Dice so Nice

forceStreamPageOBSMode.Name: Force OBS Mode on Stream Page
forceStreamPageOBSMode.Hint: Forces the /stream output to be in OBS mode at all times

minScale.Name: Escala Mínima
minScale.Hint: The lowest that the screen can zoom to

obsModeUser.Name: Utilizador Modo OBS (Nome de Utilizador)
obsModeUser.Hint: Sets this User to always be in OBS Mode, regardless of browser

proxyOBSMessages.Name: Send OBS Mode Notifications to GM
proxyOBSMessages.Hint: If enabled, notifications hidden in OBS view will be displayed in all connected GM clients

fixedPopupX.Hint: The distance to the left screen edge in pixels
fixedPopupX.Name: Pop-Up X

obsMode.Name: Modo OBS
obsMode.Hint: Sets this browser as the OBS browser. Only enable this if you are not able to use a browser source

fixedPopupHeight.Hint: The height of the pop-up in pixels
fixedPopupHeight.Name: Pop-Up Altura

showKeybindingPopup.Hint: If checked, using a keyboard shortcut will show a notification what mode was selected
showKeybindingPopup.Name: Mostrar Notificação de Atalho

fixedPopupY.Name: Pop-Up Y
fixedPopupY.Hint: The distance to the top screen edge in pixels

showTrackerInCombat.Name: Mostrar Rastreador de Combate em Combate?
showTrackerInCombat.Hint: If checked, the Combat Tracker will be visible during Combat Turns

allowWebsocketAPI.Name: Allow OBS Websocket API Access?
allowWebsocketAPI.Hint: If checked, other modules can access OBS Websocket directly

overlayActorSelect.Label: Abrir Menu
overlayActorSelect.Name: Atores de Sobreposição
overlayActorSelect.Hint: Select the Actors for the Overlay

maxScale.Name: Escala Máxima
maxScale.Hint: The highest that the screen can zoom to

diceSoNice.Hint: If checked, a Dice so Nice section will be rendered alongside the other overlays
diceSoNice.Name: Sobreposição Dice so Nice

showAV.Hint: If enabled, the Audio/Video Chat UI will be visible on OBS (might require reload in OBS)
showAV.Name: Mostrar Sobreposição de Vídeo?

fixedPopups.Hint: If enabled, all Popups are repositioned and resized to the configured values
fixedPopups.Name: Use Pop-Ups Fixos

defaultOutOfCombat.Hint: The out of Combat Camera Mode
defaultOutOfCombat.Name: Modo Fora de Combate

obsModeGlobalDisable.Name: Desativar Visualização do OBS
obsModeGlobalDisable.Hint: This will turn off the OBS features for all clients, regardless of method

smoothUserCamera.Hint: If enabled, manual camera movement will be smoothed by reducing update rate
smoothUserCamera.Name: Smooth Camera Movement

fixedPopupWidth.Hint: The width of the pop-up in pixels
fixedPopupWidth.Name: Pop-Up Largura

showUserConfig.Name: Permitir Renderização de Configuração de Utilizador?
showUserConfig.Hint: If enabled, the user config dialog will not be suppressed

streamChatPopupStyle.Hint: If enabled, the chat on /stream will be displayed like the Notifications in the Game View
streamChatPopupStyle.Name: Notification-Style Chat Overlay

showChatNotificationsOnCanvas.Hint: If enabled, chat message popups will be not be hidden from the in-game UI
showChatNotificationsOnCanvas.Name: Display Chat Notifications in Game

leftAlignChatNotifications.Name: Left Align Chat Notifications
leftAlignChatNotifications.Hint: If enabled, chat message popups will be aligned to the left side of the screen

trackObserverTokens.Name: Track Observer Tokens
trackObserverTokens.Hint: If enabled, the Director will track tokens that the user has observer permission for, not just owned tokens

showDirectorInOBSMode.Name: Show Director Controls in OBS Mode
showDirectorInOBSMode.Hint: If disabled, the Director controls will be hidden when in OBS Mode

importDialog.hint2: Escolha se deseja substituir as suas sobreposições existentes ou adicionar a lista importada.
importDialog.formatError: O ficheiro importado não é um OBS Utils Overlay Export
importDialog.hint1: Está prestes a importar uma configuração de Sobreposição exportada. Certifique-se de que foi exportado no mesmo sistema ou as Sobreposições Áudio/Vídeo podem não funcionar.
importDialog.title: Importar Dados: Sobreposições
importDialog.fileError: Não carregou um ficheiro de dados

exportDialog.content: Deseja exportar as suas Configurações de Sobreposição?
exportDialog.title: Exportar as suas configurações?

director.name: Diretor
director.forceOpenSettingsForOBSUser: Force Open Settings Menu for OBS User
director.noGMWarning: No GM is currently logged in, director settings cannot be changed
